Koha home
=========

**WELCOME TO UTM LIBRARY OCEAN (WEB OPAC)**  
  

-------------------------------------------------

Welcome to Jabatan Perpustakaan, Universiti Teknologi Malaysia. UTM Library OCEAN (WebOPAC) is computerized online catalogue of the materials held in library. OCEAN consist of an index of the bibliographic data cataloged in the system, offering a variety of search capabilities such as the author, title, call number, subjects, together with an interactive request and renewal functionality.
